information:
Prepare yourself for an unforgettable New Year's experience as Gegen, Pornceptual, and RSO join forces once again for the third year in a row, presenting a two-day odyssey of music, art, and sensual exploration. This New Year's Eve, we invite you to transcend the ordinary and embark on an extraordinary journey where passions ignite and every movement is a dance of liberation.

Step into a realm where desires are not just embraced but celebrated, where identity is fluid and ever-evolving. Here, you are free to reshape yourself, to explore the endless possibilities of your existence, and to paint your life on the infinite canvas of potentiality.

This is not just a celebration—it’s a transformation. 
This is your invitation to a radical new beginning—an epic adventure where you are the artist of your own existence. Let's make this New Year's Eve an unforgettable celebration of life, love, and limitless potential. 
Are you ready to step into the future with us?

information:
The Wait Is Over...

As per tradition, ANIMA and HEISSS are bringing you into the New Year with a celebration for the ages & an unbeatable lineup.

The soundsystem has also been upgraded to 24”inch full spectrum basses, instead of the usual 18”s from the venue. This is a custom tailor for this event, which will certainly be felt strongly in all the sub frequencies!!

We have devoted a lot of love to planning this event and cannot wait to share this final dance of 2024 with you.

See you on the other side ~

The NYE sesh you deserve. We are bringing the heat.


AGE RESTRICTION: 20 AND OVER.

NYE Tickets gets access only from 2100 on 31.12 until 1000 on 01.01
NYD Ticket gets access only from 1000 onwards on 01.01
All Access Pass gets access at any time plus free re-entry any time throughout the event.

Hot food will be available at the venue from early morning until early evening on the 1st.

Stay Safe

The BCCO team is here for you. All of our team wear BCCO Photo ID. BCCO’s Awareness team are available if you feel unwell or unsafe, you can spot them wearing a pink BCCO vest.

Important

We do operate selection on the door and a ticket does not guarantee entry. If you are refused entry your ticket price will be refunded.

We do not give refunds if you can’t attend or don’t want to wait in the line. Please plan your visit carefully and arrive early if you are coming to see a specific artist.

Floor 1 (Upstairs) will have cameras filming the DJ performance and some of the dancefloor. This footage will be used on social media after the event.

information:
As we prepare for one final Silvester party at our beloved Renate, we look forward to welcoming back old friends, meeting many new faces, and having one more magical New Year’s Eve party before we are forced to close our doors next year. New Year’s Eve has always been a special event at Renate, serving as the perfect playground for celebration, liberation and self expression. This year will be no exception as we have put together a stellar array of musical, artistic & cultural performances. We invite you from 22:00 to experience the mayhem for one final ride with the Renate circus we all know and love. There will also be the option for guests to go and view the fireworks on the Elsenbrücke with a bottle of sekt and re-enter the club.

☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐

Born from an unrenovated apartment building in Friedrichshain, across the river from Treptower Park, Renate has three main dance floors and many smaller rooms to explore. Every shade and subgenre of electronic music has its place here, from fast, groovy techno to uplifting house music, from chugging EBM to frenetic breakbeat stompers.

☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐

Tickets are available at the door. RA ticket does not guarantee entry; purchased tickets will be refunded in that case.

Please note we are fully cashless, we ONLY accept CARD and BITCOIN payments at the club.

Renate should be a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism or homophobia will not be tolerated.
In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff.
pick_blurb: Renate sees in the New Year for what could be the final time, going long and wild with friends old and new. The expansive lineup includes Alienata, Beatrice and Johannes Albert.

information:
// some tickets are available at the door, subject to capacity.

Come early, stay forever!

Glide into 2025 and celebrate new beginnings and good riddance!

Bask in the dawn of the new year through immersive techno, soulful house, and that signature OXI touch. We've got a divine mix of very special guests and the finest local talent. 
If our heated garden is not enough for you to wind down, we've got a tranquil Ambient Floor, a tasty Chili Soup Bar and a toasty Glühwein on tap!

Ring in the new year at OXI’s 36-hour marathon, a boundary-pushing celebration catering to the city’s vibrant creative community. From the UK’s Yazzus—renowned for her high-octane rave aesthetics, breakbeats, and forward-thinking club sounds—to the experimental selections of SPFDJ and Spekki Webu, who each channel hypnotic, off-kilter techno vibrations, this lineup is primed to captivate. Iconic Berlin-based innovator Skee Mask will deliver his signature blend of atmospheric techno and break-heavy grooves, while Phase Fatale’s industrial, EBM-infused sets promise darker, immersive textures. For those craving something sleek and refined, Matrixxman’s razor-sharp Detroit-influenced techno and Luca Olivotto’s warm, house-driven rhythms bring depth and contrast. Finally, the incandescent Only Fire, known for melding pop culture references with leftfield club beats, rounds out a program as diverse and dynamic as the audience it proudly celebrates. This is a true sonic odyssey, unfolding in an inclusive space where everyone can dance into 2025 together.

O Floor decorations by: @ashhigginson

We strive to provide a safe & worry-free space.
Please respect everyone's identity, act with consent and care.
Discriminatory behaviour of any kind will not be tolerated.
Please respect our no photo/video policy.

Re-entry is €5 and only applicable once (no matter how many times you re-enter). 

Please note that having a ticket doesn't guarantee entry. 
If you are refused entry for any reason, your ticket will be refunded. 
No refunds will be given if you can't make it, change your mind or if you do not want to wait in line.

information:
LEFT BLANK | 31.12.2024-02.01.2025 | silvesternacht ab 23:00 uhr

"und wir tanzten bis zum ende / zum herzschlag der besten musik / jeden abend, jeden tag, wir dachten schon, das ist der sieg / das war vor jahren." (fehlfarben, das war vor jahren)
zwei blankschwarze nächte und den fehlfarbigen neujahrstag dazwischen basstölpeln und trottellummen wir ins fünfzehnte jahr am ostkreuz. ein kollektiver sprung in die dämmerung, ein sturzflug über der dünung, eine heftige böe über der brandung, auftrieb an der steilwand durch die gischt, wo sich heliumhouse und heißlufttechno mischen, rollende schaumkronen und zuckerwattigster nebel. dann tauchen wir endgültig ein und sind verschwunden, mindestens für diesen anhaltenden moment, in der die zukunft noch unbeschrieben, noch blank ist. leave no one behind as no one should be left in darkness. because our hotel is still a red heart and will never be a bloody triangle.



"and we danced until the end / to the heartbeat of the best music / every evening, every day, we thought that was the victory / that was years ago." (fehlfaben, das war vor jahren)
two stark black nights and the miss-colored new year's day in between gannets and guillemots, we enter our fifteenth year at ostkreuz. a collective jump into the twilight, a dive over the swell, a violent gust above the surf, buoyancy on the steep wall through the spray, where helium house and hot air techno mix, rolling whitecaps and cotton candy fog. then we finally deep dive and disappear, at least for this lingering moments in which the future is still unwritten, still blank. leave no one behind as no one should be left in darkness. because our hotel is still a red heart and will never be a bloody triangle.

Farewell Watergate, see you on the floors!

information:
EVENT STARTS 1 AM ON THE 1ST AND ENDS 9 AM ON THE 2ND!

Wer kommt, der kommt! on NYE is presented by Betriebsfeier Berlin ...

TICKETS GIBT ES AN DER TÜR / KASSE TICKETS AT DOOR / BOX OFFICE ALL NIGHT / DAY 

„Wer kommt, der kommt“ … oder … „Neujahr mit den Allerliebsten“! Ganz ohne den silvesterlichen Schnickschnack, Gedrängel, Stressfaktor und Super-Hyper-Silvester-Highlights laden die Hoppetossen-Liebhaber und Betriebsfeier-Kapitäne Empro und Coco in diesem Jahr wieder zu ihrem Neujahrsempfang auf ihren Lieblings-Kahn. Die Musik kommt direkt von der Dichte-Gang, geschmückt mit ein paar illustren Importen. Und das bedeutet: voller Liebe mit allen Lieben in einem Boot, auf ganz großer Reise ins nächste Jahr 2025! Los gehts am in der Silvesternacht um 1 Uhr! 

"Wer kommt, der kommt" is the yearly NYE night presented by Betriebsfeier Berlin. No cirus, no NYE blah blah, no specials - just pure sound and real people. Dance the year away, welcome the new one and come as you are - we are happy to have you with us!

information:
Get ready for another intense midweek session for Berlin's most dangerous day of the week to rave - WEDNESDAY Lose yourself at AVA Club in the heart of Berlin - underneath the Train Tracks of Warschauer Str S-Bahn Station. This is where your weekend starts or ends on Wednesday! Join us for Mittwoch every week to feel the rolling bass lines and deep kick drums of techno, hard techno, and trance punching through the speakers all night. And since there’s no drama at the door, everyone can experience our best and most sensual night without compromise. Just close your eyes, forget your name, forget the world: It’s Mittwoch. WARNING: Partying on a Wednesday may be hazardous to your health, studies or work...but fuck it,  

Komm in deinem besten Techno-Outfit oder einfach so, wie du dich am wohlsten fühlst. Das Wichtigste ist, dass du bereit bist, die Nacht zu erleben und dich der Musik hinzugeben. Der Techno Mittwoch ist eine Feier der TECHNO Kultur, die die Grenzen des Möglichen überschreitet. Es ist eine Einladung, in eine Welt einzutauchen, in der die Zeit stillsteht und die Musik regiert. Sichere dir jetzt deine Tickets und sei Teil dieser elektrisierenden Nacht! Lass den Alltag hinter dir und tauche ein in die Welt des Techno. Wir sehen uns auf der Tanzfläche!  

YOLO! DON'T FORGET: ARRIVE BEFORE MIDNIGHT, EACH TICKET HOLDER IS ELIGIBLE TO BRING ONE FREE GUEST!    

No Sexism, No Racism, No Homophobia.

information:
PYRAMID PARTY + Dose of Pleasure + SAUNA (With + DJs + Live Music + Mantras + MIDNIGHT DRAG PERFORMANCE) at Studio DB

Pyramid Party has moved to Studio DB -  in a heated venue with a sauna -  on January 1st from 4PM–4AM!

However, we regret to inform you that the December 31st night at SEZ has been CANCELLED due to unforeseen legal issues with the venue.

What happened to Pyramid Party New Year at SEZ?
There’s a legal dispute over the venue. Green Yoga has stayed in the space, backed by lawyers and architects opposing the SEZ’s demolition. In the past days however, the property manager for the Berlin Government changed the locks and shut off electricity and water—despite a court order. Unfortunately, we’ve now been told we can’t return until January 14.
We’re truly sorry for the inconvenience and worked hard with a large team to try to make it happen.

INSTEAD WE HAVE THE CHANCE TO CELEBRATE THE NEW YEAR AT STUDIO DB ON THE 1ST OF JANUARY FROM 4PM-4AM. 

A venue with heating and sauna.
Limited to 150 or so people. 


PLEASE REGISTER TO THIS EVENT IF YOU ARE CERTAIN TOO JOIN - EVEN IF YOU REGISTERED TO THE SEZ PYRAMID PARTY.

information:
„Das Leben ist kein Wunschkonzert. Musikwünsche gibt es nicht, oder kosten 5 Euro – wenn sie gefallen und ins Set passen“. 
Die sind auch gar nicht nötig: Resident DJ MissVergnügen bedient ein eklektisches musikalisches Spektrum, das von 20er-Jahre-Musik bis hin zu Elektro reicht und dessen Bandbreite wie auch Auswahl gar keine Wünsche offenlassen kann. 
Dahinter steht auch die klare Ansage, dass es die Künstlerin nur langweilen würde, bei einer Sache hängen zu bleiben – ziemlich naheliegend bei ihrem facettenreichen Talent als Musikerin, DJ und Sängerin ... Mittwochabend mit MissVergnügen heißt schließlich auch, sich von ihr abholen lassen, in welche Richtung es auch immer geht und dann treiben lassen! Also: Vergnügliches Neues Jahr!

information:
Day Four of Tresor's Silvester '24/'25 Week-long Marathon. 

The return of Tresor's Still Awake party, the club's traditional January 2nd event and enabler of breaking all New Year's resolutions. 

Globus features some of the finest purveyors of bass, breaks and forward-thinking club music, with Zenker Brothers & Nadia Struiwigh. 
In the basement, Tresor provides a much needed hi-nrg soundtrack for those still bringing in 2025 with DJ Mell G, Madalba, Viikatory & Shaleen. 
Tresor Records new signing, UFO95 performs his impressive 90min live set as he begins his new residency at the club. 

This event can be paired with Tresor's Silvester '24/'25 as part of a combi-ticket offer. More information and all combi-ticket purchases can be found on the Tresor's Silvester '24/'25 event page.

Experience a night full of eroticism, art and pulsating energy - at Body Oscillation you are not just a guest, but part of a unique work of art.

Über BODY OSCILLATION 

Betritt die verführerische Welt von Body Oscillation – die Kinky Party, die Erotik, Körperkunst und ekstatische Klänge vereint. Eine Nacht, die deine Sinne betört, deine Fantasie beflügelt und Dich in eine vibrierende Welt aus Burlesque, Bodypaint Art und treibendem Techno entführt.

information:
New year, same U10247 freak power!

maniac&me will have the exceptional talent Anthony Georges Patrice (aka AGP) joining him on this first Thursday 2025:
Anthony's taste oscillates between Dubtechno, Deep House and Minimal tunes, aiming to never really stick to a genre to maximize the listener's voyage. Deep down into the realms of house & techno, he created the Ausblick imprint: Endorsed by massive remixes from Losoul or Steve O'Sullivan, while at the same time pushing forward breakthrough artists, Ausblick proves to be a bold outpost for the minimal house scene. 
Besides producing, djing and label running, Anthony is simply one hell of a fuckin great dude to spend time with - so brace yourself, 2025 will start with a tsunami of good vibes.

maniac&me will certainly be joining the march shooting minimal and house (vinyl-only) tracks, but is known to shift up a technoid gear or two in the morning hours.

wir möchten euch mitteilen, dass unser Kinky Colourful New Year 25 dieses mal nicht im KitKat stattfindet.

⬤ ABOUT PARADISE GARAGE ⬤
We believe that great musical traditions should never die. Our Paradise Garage party series is a tribute to the legendary New Yorker Paradise Garage club that was the place where House music and Disco bloomed between 1976 and the time of its closure in 1987.

Our Paradise Garage remains 100% loyal to the musical tradition of the New Yorker club and his legendary resident Larry Levan. You will not hear Techno, or any of the common modern interpretations of House music and Disco at the party.

Our Paradise Garage is also defined as a sex-positive party. It requires a dress code (read below), and is a safe space for kinky communities and LGTBQ, escorted by a professional and devoted awareness team.

The dress code is meant to emphasize the border between the everyday and the space we create. We wish to encourage our guests to safely express themselves through fashion and their individual choices of clothes and accessories.

information:
New year, same U10247 freak power!

maniac&me will have the exceptional talent Anthony Georges Patrice (aka AGP) joining him on this first Thursday 2025:
Anthony's taste oscillates between Dubtechno, Deep House and Minimal tunes, aiming to never really stick to a genre to maximize the listener's voyage. Deep down into the realms of house & techno, he created the Ausblick imprint: Endorsed by massive remixes from Losoul or Steve O'Sullivan, while at the same time pushing forward breakthrough artists, Ausblick proves to be a bold outpost for the minimal house scene. 
Besides producing, djing and label running, Anthony is simply one hell of a fuckin great dude to spend time with - so brace yourself, 2025 will start with a tsunami of good vibes.

maniac&me will certainly be joining the march shooting minimal and house (vinyl-only) tracks, but is known to shift up a technoid gear or two in the morning hours.

Duma, The Collective stands strong with the Minimal Bar values:
 No Racism. No Sexism. No Homophobia. No Transphobia. No Discrimination of any kind.

Absolute Body Control is a cult Belgian electronic band formed in 1979, notable as the first major project of musicians Dirk Ivens and Eric Van Wonterghem. They have developed a dedicated underground following, drawing influence from bands like Suicide, D.A.F, and the UK electronic scene. Renowned for their dark atmospheres and captivating melodies, the group blends elements of electronic music and post-punk. Their lyrics often delve into themes of introspection and human relationships, often with a hint of irony. With energetic live performances and a talent for reinvention, they have built a loyal fanbase.

information:
The sex-positive electro house party for youngsters and the young at heart, freaks and kinky people
Techhouse – Techno – Electro by DJs Andree Wischnewski, Der Freak & Taktgeber
BDSM catacombs & couple's gallery open from 10 p.m.
Love Patrol - Awareness Team
Dress code: Kinky, black glamour, fetish, BDSM, clubwear, no street clothes!
Free admission for youngsters aged 18-25!
Admission: €25 per person / €15 for students and those on benefits

Young Love

For more than a decade, the techno bass has been booming on Fridays, presented by some of the capital's most special DJs, and a young crowd has been flocking to the unholy dance temple when “Young Love” is on the flyer.

A mix of guests that couldn't be more exciting, with sexy freaks, young hoppers, glamorous clubbers and delicious night owls can look forward to a particularly danceable combination this time.

Berlin DJs and national acts are at the turntables and play a sound that can only be experienced at “Young Love”. Sophisticated. Driving. Innovative.

And while the main hall is rocking, adventurous guests can enjoy the BDSM catacombs, the couple's gallery or the jacuzzi. An awareness team is always in the club, ensures your safety and is always approachable.

And all this in a club where all age groups feel comfortable, and also dare to explore new paths of passion or just party wildly - the INSOMNIA.

Even in the often financially difficult times after the pandemic, we want to continue to make all youngsters happy and grant all visitors between the ages of 18 and 25 free admission.

Please present appropriate proof (student ID, social ticket BVG, etc.) at the box office for the social or student ticket.

event_name: Dorothy's Friend – The End of the Parties-Party
artists: Feel .MA
lineup: Feel .MA
information:
Welcome to Dorothy’s Friend – the End of the Parties-Party! The weekend is here, and after the whirlwind of Christmas celebrations and New Year’s festivities, it’s time to party yet again! Yes, we’re keeping the energy alive and giving the holiday season the grand send-off it deserves with one last unforgettable night. It’s the long weekend, the first Friday of the year, and the perfect moment to gather your friends, hit the dance floor, and let loose before the routines of everyday life return.
This time, we’re embracing the after-the-parties vibe – think rumpled Santas, disheveled elves, and 2025 party hats and glasses that have clearly survived one too many celebrations. The decorations may be frayed (and so could you), but the energy is far from gone!
The name Friends of Dorothy holds a cherished place in queer history. Originating as a subtle code used by LGBTQ+ individuals to connect during times of adversity, it symbolizes solidarity, safe spaces, and the enduring bonds of friendship. Inspired by Dorothy from The Wizard of Oz, whose journey celebrated courage and camaraderie, we come together to honor those same values in our vibrant, inclusive way.
This special January edition is a toast to the end of the holiday frenzy and the start of a new chapter. Whether you’re looking to dance off the last remnants of New Year’s indulgence, reconnect with friends, or simply revel in the moment, this party is yours to make unforgettable.
As your DJ, I’ll be curating a set that reflects the diversity and energy of our community. Expect a blend of house, disco, and eclectic sounds designed to keep you moving, mingling, and immersed in the moment. Whether you’re sipping on cocktails, sharing laughs, or losing yourself on the dance floor, the music will weave its magic to create the perfect vibe for the night.

DJ: Feel. MA
Raised in a small village in Northern Italy, Feel. MA found refuge in music, shaped by the eclectic tastes of his parents. The vibrant club scene introduced him to the world of electronic and dance music, setting him on a path of passion and discovery.
Influenced by Italian producers and the London warehouse movement, Feel. MA crafts a soundscape that fuses house, electro, and disco. Now based in Berlin, he’s become a staple in iconic venues like Chantal House of Shame and KitKat club, captivating audiences with his long sets and dynamic energy.
Feel. MA’s mission is simple: to reignite the passion of house and disco music and guide listeners on a journey of self-expression and unity through uplifting beats and positive vibes that transcend boundaries and languages.

Die Berliner Zeitung titelte: „Die haltbarste Party der Stadt“, denn seit immerhin Februar 1996 sind die „Stimmen in Aspik“ mit ihren kultigen deutschen Hits aus 5 Jahrzehnten aus dem Berliner Nachtleben nicht mehr wegzudenken. Immer freitags haben schon über 400.000 Besucher das kuschelige, traditionsreiche, kleine Tanzlokal in Berlin Mitte seit Beginn der Partyreihe besucht.

information:
Originally from Spain, Berlin-based DJ and producer BLANKA infuses each set with the warmth of her origins, mesmerising crowds globally from Basement, New York to Rex Club, Paris. Spearheading the label and event series Room Trax in Berlin and Barcelona, BLANKA has been turning heads across the techno scene, with releases on cutting edge labels like SK_eleven and Soma. On January 4th, PRXMTY teams up with Berlin label Das Werk, inviting BLANKA to the ROBUS floor, with MDSM, Maruwa and more holding it down at SUMME.

INFO

• Located on the grounds of the former Bärenquell brewery factory in East Berlin.
• 2 converted Warehouse dancefloors with state of the art sound systems.
• Custom made by Kirsch Audio. 40kW, 48 channels, 153 drivers, signature horn technology
• cash and cashless payment
• 5 min walk from Schöneweide station, 4 stops from Ostkreuz and 3 stops from Neukölln with S-Bahn
• 18 minutes by Bus 165 from Schlesisches Tor

information:
We are absolutely stunned to start 2025 with this stunning Klubnacht lineup. Presenting you two rising techno stars as our Headliners for this electrizing night at Club OST. 

Our first Headliner is Amber Broos. Amber Broos is a talented DJ from Belgium, driven by a deep love for music. At just twenty-two, she captivates listeners with her monthly show on Tomorrowland's official station, One World Radio. Her sound stands out for its seamless blend of house, club, and techno, expertly tailored to connect with her audience.

Our second Headliner is Mha Iri. Originally from Scotland, Mha Iri has quickly established herself as one of the most exciting names in techno today. 
In 2023, she achieved incredible milestones, becoming Beatport’s #1 best-selling female Hard Techno artist and ranking #2 in Peak Time/Driving Techno. Her tracks, released on renowned labels like Drumcode and Filth on Acid, dominated Beatport’s Top 10 charts, with hits like “Bam Bam Bam” and “Bell” claiming #1 spots.

Make sure you don’t miss this unforgettable night!

RAVE ON! WE LOVE TECHNO!


Die Zitadelle Spandau ist eine der bedeutenden und besterhaltenen Festungen der Hochrenaissance in Europa. Sie befindet sich nordöstlich der Spandauer Altstadt am gegenüberliegenden Havelufer im Berliner Ortsteil Haselhorst und ist eine bekannte Sehenswürdigkeit des Berliner Bezirks Spandau.Kern der Anlage ist eine mittelalterliche Burg, von der noch Bergfried und Palais erhalten sind. Um sie herum wurde in den Jahren 1559–1594 ein Festungsbauwerk nach dem damals aktuellen Stand der Technik angelegt.

information:
Day Six of Tresor's Silvester '24/'25 Week-long Marathon.

information:
Born from an unrenovated apartment building in Friedrichshain, across the river from Treptower Park, Renate has three main dance floors and many smaller rooms to explore. Every shade and subgenre of electronic music has its place here, from fast, groovy techno to uplifting house music, from chugging EBM to frenetic breakbeat stompers.

☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐ ☐

The non-smoking regulations apply in the club. Smoking is only permitted in the garden.

Tickets are available at the door. RA ticket does not guarantee entry; purchased tickets will be refunded in that case. Box office 22€ (incl. 2€ wardrobe).

Please note we are fully cashless, we ONLY accept CARD and BITCOIN payments at the club.

Renate should be a safe space for any ethnicity, gender or sexual orientation. Any sign of racism, sexism or homophobia will not be tolerated.
In case you feel that you have been treated wrongly, or that your space has been violated, please notify our awareness team or our staff.

information:
Der erste Samstag im neuen Jahr ist keine normale Klubnacht, sondern eine Live From Earth Klub Party im Berghain. Basspunk ist der Name des Debütalbums des Londoner Duos Bassvictim und kann auch als Genrebezeichnung für ihren Indie-Sleaze-Sound gelten, der eine Mischung aus Grunge und Rap-Rock-Synthie-Pop ist. Der zweite Live-Act ist das Hamburger Duo Extrawelt, das 2005 auf James Holdens Border Community debütierte und seitdem mit acidlastigen Acid-Trance-Bangern und brustbetontem Electro überzeugt. Chippy Nonstop ist eine in Kanada lebende DJ und Gründerin des Kollektivs Intersessions, das Frauen und nicht-binären Menschen das Auflegen beibringt. In ihrem Sound verschmelzen harter Techno, Jungle und Footwork zu einem funky Uptempo-Groove. Auch in den Sets von DJ Vanille aus Marseille prallen musikalische Welten aufeinander, die von geradlinigem Techno über Acid House bis hin zu Hard-Dance, Trance und Psy-Trance reichen. Freuen kann man sich auch auf ein Wiedersehen mit Modeselektor, die nach vielen Jahren wieder ein DJ-Set im Berghain spielen werden.

On the first Saturday of the New Year, instead of the usual Klubnacht, Live From Earth Klub will take over Berghain. Basspunk is the debut album by London duo Bassvictim, its title also serving as a genre description for their sleazy indie sound, mixing grunge, rap-rock and synth-pop. Also performing a live set is Hamburg duo Extrawelt, who have been impressing audiences ever since their debut on James Holden's Border Community in 2005, offering acid-heavy acid trance bangers and chest-thumping electro. Chippy Nonstop is a Canadian-based DJ and founder of the Intersessions collective, which teaches women and non-binary people how to DJ. Her sound fuses hard techno, jungle and footwork into a funky uptempo groove. Musical worlds also collide in the sets of DJ Vanille from Marseille, ranging from straightforward techno and acid house to hard dance, trance and psy-trance. You can also look forward to Modeselektor, returning to Berghain for the first time in years with a DJ set.

information:
SPHYNXCAST is back!

To kick off the year in high voltaged energy, we're thrilled to announce the first event of 2025 and the first episode of Season 3! This time Parisha has put together an line-up featuring DJs from Leipzig's LPZG CALLIN collective.

Since 2021, SPHYNXCAST has been showcasing and capturing Berlin's underground techno scene through their podcast series and events. They've become a go-to for raw, hypnotic techno and have firmly established themselves as a present player in the city's music culture. With over 25 shows last year alone, it's the support of their growing community that keeps it going.

Starting as a group of friends in Leipzig, LPZG CALLIN has become a steadily growing community, putting their own stamp on the city's underground music scene through their open-air and off-location shows. 

Date 4th of January 2025

Line up

Junktion (LPZG CALLIN)
Mononom (LPZG CALLIN)

information:
##English below!## 

Willkommen zu "Oriental Nights" – Eine Party zur Feier von Musik, Kultur und Gemeinschaft! 

Samstag 4.Jan.2025: 22 Uhr - 6 Uhr am at Beate Uwe Club (Schillingstr. 31 • 10179 Berlin) 

"Oriental Nights" ist ein Musik-Event, das Downtempo, House, Techno und Psytrance mit arabischen und SWANA (Südwestasien und Nordafrika) Melodien, Instrumenten und Gesang verbindet. 
Organisiert von Queers & Allies aus der arabischen Welt, Oriental Nights feiert Vielfalt, Kreativität und die Community durch Musik und Kultur. 

Der Club wird mit atemberaubender arabischer Dekoration verwandelt, um die perfekte Stimmung für eine unvergessliche Nacht zu schaffen.

Der Club ist barrierefrei zugänglich. 

Line-up: 

☾ ALternative Bauchtanz Performance by Lina ☾

☾ DJ Abdallah & Dharma: Arabische Downtempo-Beats & live Tuba 
☾ DJ Andeel: Einzigartige Mischung aus arabischem (House, Techno und Psytrance) 
☾ DJ Femalemacho: uplifting ethno tribal beats
☾ DJ Hamza: Driving blend of Organic House, Deep und Melodic Techno.

☾Sei Teil der Nacht – alle Körper sind willkommen!☾



Welcome to "Oriental Nights" – A Party to Celebrate Music, Culture, and Community! 

Saturday 4.Jan.2025: 20 Uhr - 6 Uhr at Beate Uwe Club (Schillingstr. 31 • 10179 Berlin) 

 "Oriental Nights" is a music event blending Downtempo, House, Techno, and Psytrance with Arabic and SWANA (South West Asia and North Africa) melodies, instruments, and vocals. Organized by Queers & Allies from the Arabic world, the event celebrates diversity, creativity, and unity through music and culture.
The club hosting the event is wheelchair accessible.
The club will be transformed with stunning Arabian décor, setting the perfect mood for an unforgettable night. 

Lineup: 

☾ Alternative Belly Dance Performance by Lina ☾

☾ DJ Abdallah w/ Dharma: Downtempo beats & live Tuba 
☾ DJ Andeel: unique mix of Arabic (House, Techno and Psytrance) 
☾ DJ Femalemacho: Mitreißende Ethno-Tribal-Beats
☾ DJ Hamza: treibende Mischung aus House, Deep und Melodic Techno.

☾Come be part of the night – all bodies are welcome!☾
